name: Zapdos

passive.name: Peal of Thunder
passive.effect: When you put this Pokemon into play (except during setup), deal 30 damage to a Pokemon other than this Pokemon chosen at random (use a d12).

attacks.name: Big Thunder
attacks.effect: This attack does 70 damage to a random Pokemon other than this one (use a d12).
